question: You are studying for a qualification, and you would like some time off work to complete it. Write a letter to your manager. In your letter: Ask for some time off to complete a qualification. Suggest what you will do later at work if you have time off.
text: The intent of this letter is to request  9 days' leave from 21-29th June, 2022 as I have my certificate exam scheduled for Project Management. I have already completed my 35 PDU hours for the Project which I need to submit in the first 5 days of the leaves, then my exam is scheduled after 4 days. However, during the leaves Rajeev has agreed to cover me and post the leaves I will be working on weekends to compensate plus there are 5 annual leaves that I already applied for in the Work management portal.

I believe that this certification will be an addon for me as we are already working on projects with timelines and following the sprints with pointer methods for our evaluations. Moreover, the experience would be a plus as we have Automation projects aligned in the next few months to cover.
Request you to consider my request as I will be waiting for your earnest approval.
